aiTechnology.title: AI Technology
aiTechnology.description: Our advanced AI systems are designed to protect your children while maintaining their privacy.
aiTechnology.description1: Our in-house developed AI models process millions of data points per second, built from the ground up with children's safety in mind. Our proprietary algorithms identify and block threats before they reach your children, ensuring total privacy.

owndevelopment.title: In-House Development
owndevelopment.description: Built from scratch by our team

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data belongs to you, and only you.
privacy.description1: Your family's privacy is paramount. With our zero-knowledge architecture, you retain full control over your personal information. We believe that privacy is not just a feature; it is a fundamental right.

dataprivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataprivacy.description: Full control and ownership of your personal data. We guarantee that your information remains private and secure.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear and direct policies on how your data is handled, processed, and protected.

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: Download or transfer your data anytime. Your data moves with you.

zeroknowledge.title: Zero Knowledge
zeroknowledge.description: Our zero-knowledge architecture means we never see or store your personal information.

e2e.title: End-to-End Encryption
e2e.description: Your data is protected at all times, from transmission to storage.

privacysettings.title: Privacy Settings
privacysettings.description: Customize your privacy preferences with detailed controls for data sharing and visibility.

securityprotection.title: Security & Protection
securityprotection.description: Comprehensive enterprise-level protection and complete online security for your family.
securityprotection.description1: We combine military-grade security with 360° online protection. Our unified framework employs multi-layer defense, advanced encryption, and intelligent content filtering to safeguard every aspect of your digital life.

multilayerprotection.title: Multi-Layer Protection
multilayerprotection.description: In-depth defense system with multiple layers of security.

networkshield.title: Network Shield
networkshield.description: Protection on any network or device.

advancedencryption.title: Advanced Encryption
advancedencryption.description: Military-grade encryption for all your data.

accesscontrol.title: Access Control
accesscontrol.description: Granular management of permissions and authentication.

characteristics.title: Features
characteristics.description: Advanced tools designed to protect your family
characteristics.description1: Our platform offers you a complete set of tools, specifically designed to protect your family in the digital environment. With intuitive controls and advanced features, you can ensure the safety of your loved ones.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your Family?
cta.description: Join thousands of families already using SafeCircle to ensure their children's online safety.

footer.description: Protecting children online through AI and privacy-focused technology.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover our mission, team, and the values that drive our commitment to digital security

description.title: Description
description.content: SafeCircle is a tool that detects suspicious messages (pedophilia, cyberbullying, financial security...) on messaging platforms and social networks, alerting parents in case of danger while respecting children's privacy. Through automated AI work and total confidentiality, SafeCircle offers peace of mind knowing that your children browse and interact safely and healthily, without the hassle of monitoring every application used by minors.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work and commitment

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: Transparency and collaboration through open source

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the creative minds behind SafeCircle

tomas.description: Lead web developer and designer at SafeCircle. Expert in digital security and innovative solutions development.

victor.description: Head of Marketing and Communications. Specialist in growth strategies and public relations.

fabio.description: Assistant for ideas and decisions. Brings vision and creativity to the SafeCircle team.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to provide families with the necessary tools to protect their children in the digital world, maintaining a perfect balance between security and privacy. We believe in a safer internet for everyone, where minors can explore and learn without unnecessary risks.

health.title: Good Health and Well-being
health.description: We promote digital well-being and mental health of minors in the online environment. Our solutions help create a healthy and safe digital environment for the development of children and adolescents.

work.title: Decent Work
work.description: We foster sustainable technological development and responsible economic growth. We create opportunities for innovation in cybersecurity and digital protection.

peace.title: Peace and Justice
peace.description: We contribute to creating a safer and fairer internet for everyone. We work to prevent cyberbullying and protect minors from harmful content, promoting justice in the digital environment.

partnerships.title: Partnerships for the Goals
partnerships.description: We collaborate with institutions to strengthen digital security. We establish strategic alliances with organizations committed to protecting minors on the internet.

needs.title: Needs
needs.subtitle: Analysis and solutions for social media safety

context.title: Current Context
context.description: SafeCircle addresses the current problem regarding safety on social media. Social networks and the internet are an important part of many people's lives, but they can also be dangerous if not used with caution. Some of the problems that arise from this field are the lack of security in networks. With SafeCircle, we trust that we can solve this problem simply and effectively.

stats.title: Evolution of Grooming
stats.subtitle: Reported cases 2013-2023
stats.description: Family safety is our reason for being. The following graph shows data from the "Volunteer Newspaper". This helps us understand the trend and evolution of exposed cases.
stats.source: Graph: Volunteer Newspaper • Source: Ministry of Interior

article.content: SafeCircle is pioneering a new approach to digital safety by implementing robust security measures and leveraging blockchain technology to ensure data integrity and user privacy.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is our top priority. Learn how we protect your data.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
commitment.content: At SafeCircle, we prioritize the privacy and security of your family's data. Our platform is built on a zero-knowledge architecture, ensuring that your personal information remains completely private and under your control.

items.localMonitoring: We never see or store your personal data - all monitoring is done locally
items.encryption: All data is encrypted end-to-end using AES-256 & RSA encryption
items.control: You maintain full ownership and control of your data
items.export: Data can be exported or deleted at any time

items.controls: Granular privacy controls for customizing data sharing

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or data practices, please contact our privacy team:

agreement.description: By accessing or using SafeCircle's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. Our services are designed to protect families while respecting privacy and data ownership rights.

service.description: SafeCircle provides AI-powered child safety monitoring services that include:

responsibilities.credentials: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
responsibilities.compliance: Use the service in compliance with all applicable laws
responsibilities.privacy: Respect the privacy rights of all users
responsibilities.security: Not attempt to circumvent or disable any security features

liability.description: While we strive to provide the highest level of protection, SafeCircle is not liable for:

limitations.connectivity: Internet connectivity issues or service interruptions
limitations.violations: Actions taken by users in violation of these terms
limitations.filtering: Content that may bypass our filtering systems
limitations.damages: Any indirect, consequential, or incidental damages

changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or through the service interface.

contact.description: For questions about these terms, please contact our legal team:
